total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the input grids of the examples.
Q2: Notice that the pattern in the output grids is a mirrored version of the pattern in the input grids.
Q3: Identify the pattern in the input grid of the quiz.
Q4: Apply the mirrored pattern to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
